entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`chatId` TEXT NOT NULL, `type` TEXT NOT NULL, `originator` TEXT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`chatId`))

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`messageId` TEXT NOT NULL, `chatId` TEXT NOT NULL, `senderId` TEXT NOT NULL, `message` TEXT NOT NULL, `timestamp` INTEGER NOT NULL, `isRead` INTEGER NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`messageId`), FOREIGN KEY(`chatId`) REFERENCES `ChatEntity`(`chatId`) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE , FOREIGN KEY(`senderId`) REFERENCES `ChatParticipantEntity`(`userId`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION )

indices.name: index_ChatMessageEntity_chatId
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_ChatMessageEntity_chatId` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`chatId`)

indices.name: index_ChatMessageEntity_timestamp
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_ChatMessageEntity_timestamp` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`timestamp`)

indices.name: index_ChatMessageEntity_senderId
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_ChatMessageEntity_senderId` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`senderId`)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`messageId` TEXT NOT NULL, `status` TEXT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`messageId`), FOREIGN KEY(`messageId`) REFERENCES `ChatMessageEntity`(`messageId`) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE )

indices.name: index_ChatMessageStatusEntity_messageId
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_ChatMessageStatusEntity_messageId` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`messageId`)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`userId` TEXT NOT NULL, `username` TEXT NOT NULL, `onlineStatus` TEXT NOT NULL, `profilePictureUrl` TEXT, PRIMARY KEY(`userId`))

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`chatId` TEXT NOT NULL, `userId` TEXT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`chatId`, `userId`), FOREIGN KEY(`chatId`) REFERENCES `ChatEntity`(`chatId`) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE , FOREIGN KEY(`userId`) REFERENCES `ChatParticipantEntity`(`userId`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE )

indices.name: index_ChatParticipantCrossRef_chatId_userId
indices.createSql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_ChatParticipantCrossRef_chatId_userId` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`chatId`, `userId`)

indices.name: index_ChatParticipantCrossRef_userId_chatId
indices.createSql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_ChatParticipantCrossRef_userId_chatId` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`userId`, `chatId`)

views.createSql:
CREATE VIEW `${VIEW_NAME}` AS SELECT  m.messageId, 
                m.chatId,
                m.message,
                m.senderId,
                m.timestamp,
                m.isRead,
                s.messageId AS status_messageId,
                s.status AS status_status,
                p.userId AS sender_userId,
                p.username AS sender_username,
                p.onlineStatus AS sender_onlineStatus,
                p.profilePictureUrl AS sender_profilePictureUrl
        FROM ChatMessageEntity m
        LEFT JOIN ChatMessageStatusEntity s ON s.messageId = m.messageId
        LEFT JOIN ChatParticipantEntity p ON p.userId = m.senderId

CREATE VIEW `${VIEW_NAME}` AS SELECT c.chatId,
                (
                    CASE WHEN json_extract(c.type, '$.type') = 'DIRECT_CHAT'
                        THEN cp.username
                        ELSE json_extract(c.type, '$.title')
                    END
                ) AS chatTitle,
                (
                    CASE WHEN json_extract(c.type, '$.type') = 'DIRECT_CHAT'
                        THEN cp.profilePictureUrl
                        ELSE json_extract(c.type, '$.profileUrl')
                    END
                ) AS pictureUrl,
                c.type AS chatType,
                cp2.userId AS originator_userId,
                cp2.onlineStatus AS originator_onlineStatus,
                cp2.username AS originator_username,
                cp2.profilePictureUrl AS originator_profilePictureUrl
        FROM ChatEntity c
        LEFT JOIN ChatParticipantEntity cp
            ON json_extract(c.type, '$.type') = 'DIRECT_CHAT'
            AND cp.userId = json_extract(c.type, '$.participantId')
        JOIN ChatParticipantEntity cp2 ON cp2.userId = c.originator
        JOIN ChatParticipantCrossRef cpcr2 ON cpcr2.chatId = c.chatId AND cpcr2.userId = cp2.userId

CREATE VIEW `${VIEW_NAME}` AS SELECT m.chatId, 
                m.messageId,
                m.message AS lastMessage,
                m1.last_message_timestamp AS lastMessageTimestamp,
                m1.unread_messages_count AS unreadMessagesCount,
                s.status AS messageStatus
        FROM ChatMessageEntity m
        JOIN (
            SELECT chatId, MAX(timestamp) AS last_message_timestamp,
                COUNT(CASE WHEN isRead = false THEN 1 END) AS unread_messages_count
            FROM ChatMessageEntity
            GROUP BY chatId
        ) m1
            ON m1.chatId = m.chatId AND m1.last_message_timestamp = m.timestamp
        LEFT JOIN ChatMessageStatusEntity s
            ON s.messageId = m.messageId

CREATE VIEW `${VIEW_NAME}` AS SELECT * FROM view__full_message m
        WHERE
            json_extract(m.message, '$.type') IN (
                'NON_UPLOADABLE_PENDING_MESSAGE',
                'UPLOADABLE_PENDING_MESSAGE'
            )
            AND json_extract(m.message, '$.isReadyToSync') = 'true'
            AND m.status_status = 'PENDING'

CREATE VIEW `${VIEW_NAME}` AS SELECT * FROM view__full_message m
        WHERE json_extract(m.message, '$.type') = 'UPLOADABLE_PENDING_MESSAGE'
            AND json_extract(m.message, '$.uploadStatus.type') = 'UPLOAD_SUCCESS'

CREATE VIEW `${VIEW_NAME}` AS SELECT * FROM view__full_message m
        WHERE json_extract(m.message, '$.type') = 'SerializableMessage.UploadablePendingMessage'
            AND json_extract(m.message, '$.uploadStatus') = 'SerializableUploadStatus.Triggered'
